tasks.task: Feeding and managing backgrounding cattle during fall 2021, considering alternative feeds and cost of gain.
subtasks: Ensuring feed source testing for nitrates and other contaminants.
Calculating nutrient requirements and energy costs for cattle.
Evaluating the cost-effectiveness of different feed rations.
Considering the impact of drought on feed quality and availability.
Integrating co-products like distillers grains and wheat middlings into cattle rations.
Monitoring and adjusting calcium and phosphorus levels in rations.
Evaluating the use of ionophores or implants for improved feed efficiency.
Assessing the role of water quality and availability in cattle feeding.
